alert.note: Alert for Marshall (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 19 at 8:32PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Snake River below Warren affecting Marshall County. .Snowmelt runoff is making its way into the Snake River. Reaches its initial peak after March 21st. For the Snake River...including Warren, Alvarado...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Snake River below Warren. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 67.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 65.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 67.0 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 67.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
